docs.snippet: Mrs. Obama made a rare appearance on the campaign trail on Friday to plead with young voters to support Hillary Clinton and extend President Obama’s legacy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mrs. Obama made a rare appearance on the campaign trail on Friday to plead with young voters to support Hillary Clinton and extend President Obama’s legacy.
docs.abstract: Michelle Obama, in speech at George Mason University in Virginia, urges young Americans to support Hillary Clinton's bid for presidency, making case that it would extend Pres Obama's legacy.

headline.main: Michelle Obama Makes Ardent Case for Hillary Clinton
headline.print_headline: First Lady Makes Ardent Case for Clinton

docs.snippet: Donald Trump made his usual sarcastic call Friday for Hillary Clinton's Secret Service agents to be stripped of their firearms — and then added, "let's see what happens to her."...

docs.snippet: Donald Trump on Friday called for disarming the bodyguards who protect his Democratic rival Hillary Clinton, and mused about the consequences of such a move by saying "Let's see what happens to her."  ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump on Friday called for disarming the bodyguards who protect his Democratic rival Hillary Clinton, and mused about the consequences of such a move by saying "Let's see what happens to her."

headline.main: Trump Proposes Disarming Clinton Guards: 'Let's See What Happens to Her'
headline.print_headline: Trump Proposes Disarming Clinton Guards: 'Let's See What Happens to Her'

docs.snippet: It was never true. Any of it. And even as Mr. Trump surrendered to the reality of President Obama’s birthplace, he insisted on conjuring a new falsehood....
docs.lead_paragraph: It was never true. Any of it. And even as Mr. Trump surrendered to the reality of President Obama’s birthplace, he insisted on conjuring a new falsehood.
docs.abstract: News Analysis; Donald J Trump, after five years of nurturing 'birther' issue to undermine Pres Obama, finally admits president was born in United States, but offers no apology or repentance;  Trump perpetuated falsehood in relentless effort to challenge legitimacy of nation's first black president without credible evidence of any kind, baffling and embarrassing many around him.

headline.main: Donald Trump Clung to ‘Birther’ Lie for Years, and Still Isn’t Apologetic
headline.print_headline: Trump Gives Up a Lie but Refuses to Repent

docs.snippet: Mike Pence has released a letter from his doctor vouching for his "excellent" health. The letter summarizes the medical history of the Republican vice presidential nominee and says he can maintain his high level of work and exercise routines "with...
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Pence has released a letter from his doctor vouching for his "excellent" health. The letter summarizes the medical history of the Republican vice presidential nominee and says he can maintain his high level of work and exercise routines "without limitations."

headline.main: Doctor Declares Trump Running Mate Pence to Be Healthy
headline.print_headline: Doctor Declares Trump Running Mate Pence to Be Healthy

docs.snippet: In a pair of university stops in battleground Ohio on Saturday, Bernie Sanders used his enduring popularity with young voters to urge support for Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton. It's just that his crowds aren't what they used to be....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a pair of university stops in battleground Ohio on Saturday, Bernie Sanders used his enduring popularity with young voters to urge support for Democratic nominee Hillary Clinton. It's just that his crowds aren't what they used to be.

headline.main: Sanders Urges Turned-Off Voters to Turn Out for Clinton
headline.print_headline: Sanders Urges Turned-Off Voters to Turn Out for Clinton
